Information.Name: Chinese Restaurant
Information.Description: If you're really looking for Chinese food here, you've come to the wrong place!

Beef.Name: Szechuan Spiced Beef
Beef.Description: Slices of beef with hot peppers, finely chopped nuts, bamboo shoots, green peppers

Dish.Name: Chef's Special
Dish.Description: Crispy noodles topped with shredded mixed vegetable and Barbecue Beef

Dish.Name: Hot and Sour Pork
Dish.Description: Pork tenderloin with diced bamboo shoots, onions, and pepperes in a hot and sour sauce

Dish.Name: Manarin Spareribs
Dish.Description: Spare ribs cooked with sweet rice vinegar

Dish.Name: Hunan Chicken
Dish.Description: Marinated chicken with garlic, bamboo shoots, and scallions sauteed in hot and spicy sauce

Dish.Name: Lemon Fried Chicken
Dish.Description: Breast of Chicken Deep Fried With Lemon Sauce

Dish.Name: Kung Pao Chicken
Dish.Description: Boneless chicken cubes, red peppers, peanuts, celery, mushrooms, and peas in a spicy hot sauce

Dish.Name: Steamed Salmon with Black Bean Sauce
Mixed Seafood Delight
Dish.Description: Crab, shrimps, and scallops cooked with broccoli

Dish.Name: Spiced Oysters
Dish.Description: Marinated oysters with garlic, ginger, bay leaves, red pepper, and parsley
